sentence.Network_en: Roguishly you raised your eyes with a tender look.
sentence.Network_cn: 你调皮地抬起视线,投来一个温柔眼神.

sentence.Network_en: May I say a word to your telephone, missy? he asked roguishly.
sentence.Network_cn: “可以用你的电话说句话儿 吗 ?”他流里流气地问.

sentence.Network_en: He roguishly intended to keep the money.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很无赖地打算占有那笔钱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 恶作剧地(roguishly), 此释义来源于网络辞典。-相关网页以上来源于: WordNet  roguishly  adv. roguish的变形  roguish.

sentences.sentence: "he roguishly intended to keep the money"
